mapper.insert: insert into USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PROFILEPHOTO) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{profilephoto})
mapper.select: select USER_ID as id, USER_PWD as pwd, USER_NAME as name, USER_NICKNAME as nickname, USER_PHONE as phone, USER_EMAIL as email, USER_PROFILEPHOTO as profilephoto from USER_INFO where USER_ID = #{value}
